mapper.insert: insert reading_log (book_ref, log_title, date, page, chapter, review, log_image, hashtag) values (#{book_ref}, #{log_title}, #{date}, #{page}, #{chapter}, #{review}, #{log_image}, #{hashtag})
mapper.update: update reading_log set book_title = #{book_title}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, genre = #{genre}, status = #{status}, book_image = #{book_image} where book_idx = #{book_idx}
mapper.select:
select * from reading_log where
book_title
author
publisher
genre
like '%' #{searchKey} '%'
